TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content: "shut up im dancing on the mars SHUT *kills radio* oo."
I'd say, "You jelly?" and have a troll face on my visor
I would this one big leap for the world and man. then i put then united nation flag in the martian soil
I would have a my hand in the shape of the Vulcan greeting and say with tears in my eyes "Spock would be proud."
i dont want to live on this planet anymore

"OH MY GOD WHAT IS THAT?!"

or

"I think I left my oven on."

"The Kingdom of Mars is not a signatory to the Outer Space Treaty of 1967. Scott, fetch my crown."

(Said treaty is the one forbidding anybody from making territorial claims on other worlds.)
"The Future starts now"

I would say

Hello god of war we come to explore not conquer

After Neil's step on the moon, here's the next step of human expoleration.

Or the not sirious one:

In your face dad! I told you I would walk on Mars sometime!

Edited October 17, 2012 by kevinlacht
"Get your ass to mars he said. And so I did"

"People of Mars, your home is now officially territory of the United States of America."

And with that, swarms of space-ish Black Hawks would blacken the sky.
I would say 'For the Republic of Cobatium and All Kerbal Kind!!!"
Wassssaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!
"... And I wasted 9 months for this?!"
"I'm far enough. And if I will not make it, I will be able to say to Mr. Armstrong that I followed him." Honza DoleÃ…Â¾al, 23.7.2047, Mars

I'd say "Wow that's a lot of red dust, it's going to take ages to clean this place up"

Plus I'm moving this to Off-Topic

"Damn it's chilly"

-hyperformer

*trips and falls off the lander, splat*

"&$@#!!!!"

"Get your ass to mars he said. And so I did"

Made my day~<3
It's very red up here!
"Now time to peform my real reason here; flipping the rovers back on their wheels"

"First!"

Then I'd watch the subsequent flame war.
"Now where the green women at!"
"So, uh, how do I get back home?"
"Before me lies a new frontier, one of curiosity, hidden knowledge, and pure human achievement."
